name: CL_RMT_DELIVER_MTD
description: This table contains information on the remittance delivery method when the funds are transferred independently from the remittance.

columns.name: IMAGE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the image record.

columns.name: RPT_XMISSION_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: Information about how the report and related funds were transmitted

columns.name: THIRD_PARTY_NAME
columns.description: Holds the name of the third party processing entity

columns.name: COMM_NUM
columns.description: The communication number of the third party processing entity.
